info.title: Journeyplanner V2
info.description: SL public api for journey planning

get.summary: Retrieve the accessible date period for route planning

parameters.name: X-Correlation-Id
parameters.description: For your own traceability. This is to be generated by the user and is used for correspondence with SL.

parameters.name: User-Contact-Information
parameters.description: Please provide your e-mail information. You will be notified when there is major or minor version changes.

cache-control.description: This response header will contain a max-age that hint the max time, in seconds, the data is cached for this resource. In case of no cache policy apply then it will also contain the 'no-cache' directive.

age.description: This response header contains the time in seconds the response has been in the cache when a cache policy applied. When response is not cached this header is omitted.

get.summary: Retrieve information for stops, addresses and POI:s

parameters.name: X-Correlation-Id
parameters.description: For your own traceability. This is to be generated by the user and is used for correspondence with SL.

parameters.name: User-Contact-Information
parameters.description: Please provide your e-mail information. You will be notified when there is major or minor version changes.

200.description: A trip search result object containing the suggestion of trips

cache-control.description: This response header will contain a max-age that hint the max time, in seconds, the data is cached for this resource. In case of no cache policy apply then it will also contain the 'no-cache' directive.

age.description: This response header contains the time in seconds the response has been in the cache when a cache policy applied. When response is not cached this header is omitted.

get.summary: Retrieve information for trips, addresses and POI:s

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
Sets the language of the session.
Possible values "en" (English) or "sv" (Swedish)
*Note: Text notes and disruption information is only available in Swedish. Even if "en" is selected this information will be presented in Swedish.

parameters.name: type_origin
parameters.description:
The type of the origin:
If coordinate: "coord", otherwise "any".

parameters.name: name_origin
parameters.description:
The origin of the trip:
* locations.id from stop-finder request OR
* coordinate: \<x>:\<y>:WGS84[dd.ddddd],
*Note: type must be stated in parameter "type_origin".*

parameters.name: type_destination
parameters.description:
The type of the destination:
If coordinate: "coord", otherwise "any".

parameters.name: name_destination
parameters.description:
The destination of the trip:
* locations.id from stop-finder request OR
* coordinate: \<x>:\<y>:WGS84[dd.ddddd]
*note: type must be stated in parameter "type_destination"*

parameters.name: calc_number_of_trips
parameters.description:
The number of calculated trips in the result.
*Note: Does only affect the number of public transport trips. Walk only/bike only trips or alternative trips are not affected.*

parameters.name: type_via
parameters.description:
The type of "name_via":
* always "any".
*Note: required if using "name_via"*

parameters.name: name_via
parameters.description:
Id of a stop that the trip should go via:
* The locations.id from StopFinderRequest.
*Note: only stops  can be set as via.*
*Note: type must be stated in parameter "type_via"*

parameters.name: prefer_excl_line
parameters.description:
Specifies a line that should be avoided as far as possible.
* The parameter can be specified multiple times.
* See must_exclLine for value definition
* Requires parameters sel_line and prefer_excl

parameters.name: max_time_pedestrian
parameters.description:
Max time in minutes for walk only trip (computeMonomodalTripPedestrian)
*This parameter overwrites the default value*
Default: 60

parameters.name: max_changes
parameters.description: Maximum number of interchanges in one trip. Valid values are 0-9. Default: 9.

parameters.name: compute_monomodal_trip_pedestrian
parameters.description: Enables the calculation of an additional walk only trip.

parameters.name: must_excl_line
parameters.description:
Specifies a line that is to be excluded.
* The parameter can be used multiple times to exclude several lines 
* The value of the parameter is made up of the network \<network>, the DIVA line \<line>, the line supplement \<line supplement>, the direction of travel \<direction> and the timetable project <timetable project>, each separated by a colon. E g: tfs:01050: :H:y01

* The parameter can be used multiple times to prioritise the routes of different operators
* Requires parameters sel_line and must_excl
Available values
* the values in this parameter could be retrieved from the upcoming request line-List (property "id")
* the value includes direction, which means that every included or excluded line must be defined by two parameters (two directions) or by a value where the direction is removed.
Example:
To exclude the line 83x, the parameter must_exclLine must be stated two times, one for each direction:
* &must_exclLine=tfs:06083:A:H:y01
* &must_exclLine=tfs:06083:A:R:y01
or by using a value where the direction information is removed
* &must_exclLine=tfs:06083:A::y01

parameters.name: use_only_op
parameters.description:
Specifies an operator to be used exclusively
* The parameter can be used multiple times to specify more than one operator
* The value of the parameter is made up of the network \<network>, the name of the operator \<name> and the operator code \<code>, each separated by a colon.
* It is possible to leave the \<name> blank
* Requires parameters sel_op and use_only
 Available values from SL datasource (Pubtrans)
 * "tfs::1" - SL
 * "tfs::2" - Uppsala Lokaltrafik
 * "tfs::5" - Färdtjänsten närtrafik
 * "tfs::6" - Trafikverket road ferries
 * "tfs::8" - Waxholmsbolaget
Operators in Samtrafiken data
* The operators in Samtrafiken data may vary, and because of this they are not specified in this document. The data can be found by using the line-List request if needed.
* Network for Samtrafiken data is always “sam”.
Den främsta användningen av denna funktion att exkludera data från Samtrafiken, och det lättaste sättet att göra detta är troligen att ange alla operatörer från listan ovan som use_only_op:
* &sel_op=1&use_only=1&use_only_op=tfs::1&use_only_op=tfs::2&use_only_op=tfs::5&use_only_op=tfs::6&use_only_op=tfs::8

parameters.name: change_speed
parameters.description:
Sets the speed in percentage for interchanges and walk/bike paths.
* Value: 25-400

parameters.name: calc_one_direction
parameters.description:
If enabled, this parameter prevents the journey planner from calculating one trip before the requested departure time, which is the default functionality.
E.g. when asking for a departure at 12:00, the journey planner by default atomatically presents also the departure closest before 12:00.

parameters.name: tr_it_mot_value100
parameters.description:
* Max time in minutes for foot paths in the beginning or end of a trip
* The parameter overwrites the value defined in the configuration*
* Min and max *distance* can be set using parameters min_length_pedestrian and max_length_pedestrian
Default: 10

parameters.name: sel_line
parameters.description:
Enables line filter
* The parameter can be specified multiple times.
Note: requires one of the parameter combination
* must_excl + must_excl_line
* prefer_excl + prefer_excl_line
* prefer_incl + prefer_incl_line

parameters.name: type_not_via
parameters.description:
The type of "name_not_via":
* always "any".
*Note: required if using "name_not_via"*

parameters.name: name_not_via
parameters.description:
Id of a stop that the trip should not go via:
* The locations.id from StopFinderRequest.
*Note: only stops can be set as 'not via.*'
*Note: type must be stated in parameter "type_not_via"*
Value: 9091001000009192

parameters.name: max_time_bicycle
parameters.description:
Max time (in minutes) for bike only trip (compute_monomodal_trip_bicycle)
*The parameter overwrites the default value.*
Default: 10

parameters.name: must_excl
parameters.description:
Enables definitive exclusion of Operators and Lines.
 * See sel_op and sel_line

parameters.name: sel_op
parameters.description:
Enables operators filter
Note: requires one of the parameter combination
* use_only + use_only_op
* must_excl + must_excl_op
* prefer_excl + prefer_excl_op
* prefer_incl + prefer_incl_op

parameters.name: tr_it_dep_mot_value107
parameters.description:
* Max time in minutes for bike path in the beginning of a trip
* The parameter overwrites the value defined in the configuration
* Min and max *distance* can be set using parameters min_length_bicycle and max_length_bicycle
Default: 10

parameters.name: must_excl_op
parameters.description:
Specifies an operator to exclude.
* The parameter can be used multiple times.
* See use_only_op for value definition
* Requires parameters sel_op and must_excl

parameters.name: no_alt
parameters.description:
Supress alternative/ additional trips
* Alternative trips are additionaly presented trips which do not match the preferred search criteria, e.g. a fast trip with a couple of interchanges when user has set few interchanges.
* Alternative trips are identified by "isAdditional=true" in result.

parameters.name: itd_time
parameters.description: The time of the trip. Shall be in format HHMM.

parameters.name: itd_date
parameters.description: The date of the trip in format YYYYMMDD.

parameters.name: prefer_incl
parameters.description:
Enables preferred inclusion of Operators and Lines (include if possible).
 * See sel_op and sel_line

parameters.name: prefer_excl_op
parameters.description:
Specifies an operator that should be avoided as far as possible.
* The parameter can be specified multiple times in order to penalise the routes of different operators
* See use_only_op for value definition
* Requires parameters sel_op and prefer_excl

parameters.name: use_prox_foot_search
parameters.description: Enables walk to alternative stops, nearby the selected stop.

parameters.name: incl_mot_0
parameters.description:
Include commuter train (pendeltåg) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_2
parameters.description:
Include metro (tunnelbana) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_4
parameters.description:
Include local train/tram (lokaltåg/spårväg) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_5
parameters.description:
Include bus (buss) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_9
parameters.description:
Include ship and ferry (båttrafik) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_10
parameters.description:
Include transit on demand area service (anropsstyrd områdestrafik) in trip calculation.
Note: incl_mot_5 and incl_mot_10 should be enabled.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_14
parameters.description:
Include national train (fjärrtåg) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: incl_mot_19
parameters.description:
Include accessible bus (närtrafik) in trip calculation.
Value: true

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description:
Calculate trips with least interchanges, fastest connections (leasttime ) or shortest footpaths (leastwalking).
Possible values:
* leastinterchange
* leasttime
* leastwalking
Default: leasttime

parameters.name: max_length_pedestrian
parameters.description: Maximum distance in meters for footpath sections.

parameters.name: use_only
parameters.description:
Enables definitive inclusion of Operators.
* See sel_op

parameters.name: prefer_excl
parameters.description:
Enables preferred exclusion of Operators and Lines (avoid if possible).
 * See sel_op and sel_line

parameters.name: min_length_pedestrian
parameters.description: Minimum distance in meters for footpath sections.

parameters.name: compute_monomodal_trip_bicycle
parameters.description: Enables the calculation of an additional bike only trip

parameters.name: dwell_time
parameters.description:
Adds extra waiting time (in minutes) at a via stop, when using name_via.

Accepted format:
* **HHMM** - The two-digit hour number is followed by the two-digit minute number separated by a colon.

parameters.name: tr_it_dep_mot
parameters.description:
Enables mode of transport (mot) in the beginning of a trip.
* 107 = bike
Value: 107

parameters.name: gen_c
parameters.description: Enables output of coordinate sequences for trip legs

parameters.name: prefer_incl_op
parameters.description:
Specifies an operator to be prioritised.
* The parameter can be used multiple times to prioritise the routes of different operators
* See use_only_op for value definition
* Requires parameters sel_op and preferInc

parameters.name: prefer_incl_line
parameters.description:
Specifies a line that is to be prioritised.
* The parameter can be specified multiple times in order to prioritise several lines.
* See must_exclLine for value definition
* Requires parameters sel_line and prefer_Incl

parameters.name: max_length_bicycle
parameters.description: Maximum distance in meters for bike sections

parameters.name: min_length_bicycle
parameters.description: Minimum distance in meters for bike sections.

parameters.name: itd_trip_date_time_dep_arr
parameters.description:
Search for departure time or arrival time, used in conjunction with itd_date and itd_time.
* Shall be either "dep" or "arr".
* If not set, "dep" is used by default.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-Id
parameters.description: For your own traceability. This is to be generated by the user and is used for correspondence with SL.

parameters.name: User-Contact-Information
parameters.description: Please provide your e-mail information. You will be notified when there is major or minor version changes.

200.description: A line list search result object containing a filtered list of lines

cache-control.description: This response header will contain a max-age that hint the max time, in seconds, the data is cached for this resource. In case of no cache policy apply then it will also contain the 'no-cache' directive.

age.description: This response header contains the time in seconds the response has been in the cache when a cache policy applied. When response is not cached this header is omitted.

get.summary: Retrieve information for lines. Note that

parameters.name: X-Correlation-Id
parameters.description: For your own traceability. This is to be generated by the user and is used for correspondence with SL.

parameters.name: User-Contact-Information
parameters.description: Please provide your e-mail information. You will be notified when there is major or minor version changes.

200.description: A line list search result object containing a filtered list of lines

cache-control.description: This response header will contain a max-age that hint the max time, in seconds, the data is cached for this resource. In case of no cache policy apply then it will also contain the 'no-cache' directive.

age.description: This response header contains the time in seconds the response has been in the cache when a cache policy applied. When response is not cached this header is omitted.

example.value: Required query parameter any_obj_filter_sf not specified

from.description: Validity.from and validity.to reflects the start and end dates of the the availabe timetable, when invoking trip requests

to.description: Validity.from and validity.to reflects the start and end dates of the the availabe timetable, when invoking trip requests

code.description:
Internal error code, please see internal error codes: 
   module: broker
  * -8010 Any-input uniquely verified
  * -8011 Any-list verified
  * -8012 Any-input invalid
  * -8013 Any-location found, but cannot be verified
  * -8014 Any-input has too many matches
  * -8020 No matches
  * -8031 Matches (e.g. buildings) found for a street
  * -8032 No matches found (e.g. buildings) for a street
  * -4000 No journey found for the time entered
  * -4001 Date not possible in the current timetable period
  * -4002 No origin verified
  * -4003 No destination verified
  * -4004 Origin exists, but cannot be identified
  * -4005 Destination exists, but cannot be identified
  * -4006 Only a walk has been found
  * -4007 Origin and destination are identical
  * -4008 Unknown Via-point
  * -4009 Time interval is invalid
  * -4010 Via stop point is not an interchange stop
  * -4011 Invalid Via-input
  * +4011 Moved journey already exists
  * -4012 Origin outside the valid zone (e.g. fare zone)
  * -4013 Destination outside the valid zone (e.g. fare zone)
  * -4014 Via outside the valid zone (e.g. fare zone)
  * -4020 No transition point found
  * -4030 No departures found
  * -4040 No arrivals found
  * -4050 No services found at this stop
  * -4060 No matching operators
  * -4100 No journey because of a rule
  * -4101 Rule changed the options
  * -4102 Rule changed the permitted vehicles
  * -4103 Journey has been recalculated due to a rule with different parameters
  * -4104 Rule removed the via point
  * -4300 Invalid prefer-to-exclude parameter
  * -4301 Invalid prefer-to-include parameter
  * -4302 Invalid mixing of prefer-toexclude/include parameters
  * -4303 Invalid footpath parameter
  * -9999 Trip has been cancelled
  * -10015 No journey found

id.description:
The id of the search result. Use this parameter when invoking trip requests.
Note: When searching for addresses, the complete address+house number result is type "singlehouse". If omitting house number in the search, the result is type "street". The "street" result is an average coordinate value for the addresses in this street. "Street" may be used when invoking trip requests, but might be less accurate for the user, compared to using "singlehouse".

isGlobalId.description: Value is true if location is a stop.

name.description: The name of the search result, including municipality name

disassembledName.description: The name of the search result, without municipality name

streetName.description: The street name, if search result is type "street or singlehouse".

buildingNumber.description: The house number, if search result is "singlehouse".

type.description:
The type of the result. Example values = address, stop, singlehouse, poi, street.
Note: "address" is the result from coordinate search. "Street" and "singlehouse" is the result from address text search.

isBest.description: value is true if the best search match is found.

productClasses.description:
Products at this stop. 0 = train (pendeltåg) 2 = metro (tunnelbana) 4 = train/tram (lokaltåg/spårväg) 5 = bus (buss) 9 = ship and ferry (båttrafik) 10 = transit on demand area service (anropsstyrd områdestrafik), 14 = long distance/express train

 Note: If a stop is missing product classes completely, the stop is not serviced in the available timetable, This also applies if product number is 14.

parent.description: Principality of the stop or stop area.

name.description: The name of the municipality where the search result is found

legs.description: Each leg of the trip result

hints.description: Text messages in Swedish from planned timetable regarding the trip

id.description: Id to be used as input in trip search to exclude or include one a specific line. Please see “must_excl_line” in trip search.

class.description: Mode of transport code (mot). Please see “incl_mot_[number]” in trip search

name.description: Mode of transport name, in Swedish

tripDuration.description: Duration of the trip (in seconds), according to planned timetable

tripRtDuration.description: Duration of the trip (in seconds), according to realtime updates

isAdditional.description: If value is “true” this is a recommended trip which do not match all of the the preferred search criteria, e.g. a fast journey with a couple of interchanges if you prefer fewer interchanges.

interchanges.description: The number of interchanges in the trip

isRealtimeOnlyInformative.description: The result is a schedule based search result, where the real-time is only added as information.  The real-time information did not result in a new connection.

realtimeExplanationIdx.description: if this value is 0 or higher, this result is possible according to the realtime situation  (the value which is returned does not have a meaning for the end user)

type.description: The type of the leg origin, e.g stop, platform, street, address, poi.

productClasses.description:
Products at this stop or stop area.
0 = train (pendeltåg)
2 = metro (tunnelbana)
4 = train/tram (lokaltåg/spårväg)
5 = bus (buss)
9 = ship and ferry (båttrafik)
10 = transit on demand area service (anropsstyrd områdestrafik)

RealtimeTripId.description:
Presented if the trip is included in planned timetable. Gid including Transport authority/       Trafikhuvudman  (pos 5-7) and Trip number /Turnummer (pos 12-16). Transport authorities: 001 = Storstockholms Lokaltrafik, 002 = Uppsala länstrafik (in SL data), 005 = Färdtjänstnämnden, 006 = Trafikverket, 008 = Waxholmsbolaget
AVMSTripID Presented if the trip is included in realtime data. If only AVMSTripID is presented, this trip is an extra trip added in realtime data. See RealtimeTripId for description of the information

openapiinfosObject.description: Text messages in Swedish from real time flow regarding the trip

title.description: Message to publish in journey results. Only available in Swedish.

example.value:
T-Centralen: Hissen mellan biljetthallen mot Vasagatan/Centralstationen och plattformarna för röda och gröna linjen är avstängd pga tekniskt fel. Resenärer i behov av hiss hänvisas till den andra entrén mot Vasagatan/Centralstationen, via plattformen för den Blå linjen, eller till entrén mot Sergels torg. 
Vi saknar prognos för när hissen åter kan tas i bruk.
T-Centralen: Hissen mellan biljetthallen mot Centralstationen och plattformarna för röda och gröna linjen är avstängd pga tekniskt fel. Hänvisning till de andra entréerna.

legsfootpathinfofootpathelemorigindestin.description: Origin or destination of a footpath.
